changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE deployments ( file_id integer UNIQUE NOT NULL, time_coverage_start timestamp with time zone, time_coverage_end timestamp with time zone, site_code character varying(50), cruise_id character varying(50), station character varying(1), longitude character varying(50), latitude character varying(50), quality_control_set character varying(50), geospatial_vertical_min character varying(50), geospatial_vertical_max character varying(50), geospatial_lat_max double precision, geospatial_lon_max double precision, geom geometry(Geometry,4326), CONSTRAINT deployments_pkey PRIMARY KEY (file_id), CONSTRAINT deployments_geom_check CHECK (st_isvalid(geom)), CONSTRAINT fk_file_id FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE deployments ADD COLUMN site_short_name character varying(50);

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE measurements ( measurement bigserial NOT NULL, file_id integer NOT NULL, "TIME" timestamp with time zone, "LATITUDE" double precision, "LONGITUDE" double precision, "DEPTH" real, "PSAL" real, "TEMP" real, "DOX2" real, "CHLF" real, "TURB" real, "BOT_DEPTH" real, "DIRECTION" character varying(1), "PRES_REL" real, "CNDC" real, "INSTANCE" integer, "DESC" real, "DENS" real, "TIME_quality_control" character varying(1), "LATITUDE_quality_control" character varying(1), "LONGITUDE_quality_control" character varying(1), "DEPTH_quality_control" character varying(1), "PRES_REL_quality_control" character varying(1), "PSAL_quality_control" character varying(1), "TEMP_quality_control" character varying(1), "DOX2_quality_control" character varying(1), "CHLF_quality_control" character varying(1), "TURB_quality_control" character varying(1), "BOT_DEPTH_quality_control" character varying(1), "DIRECTION_quality_control" character varying(1), "DESC_quality_control" character varying(1), "CNDC_quality_control" character varying(1), "DENS_quality_control" character varying(1), CONSTRAINT measurements_pkey PRIMARY KEY (measurement), CONSTRAINT fk_file_id FOREIGN KEY (file_id) REFERENCES indexed_file (id) MATCH SIMPLE ON UPDATE CASCADE ON DELETE CASCADE )

changeSet.author: talend
talend
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE measurements ADD COLUMN "CPHL" real, ADD COLUMN "CPHL_quality_control" character varying(1), ADD COLUMN "CHLU" real, ADD COLUMN "CHLU_quality_control" character varying(1);

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE measurements ADD COLUMN "BAT_PERCENT" real, ADD COLUMN "SBE_FLAG" real, ADD COLUMN "BOAT_SHADOW" real, ADD COLUMN "N_BIN" real, ADD COLUMN "PAR" real;

changeSet.author: talend
talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_ctd_profiles_map; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_ctd_profiles_map AS SELECT d.file_id, f.url, f.size, site_code, cruise_id, station, time_coverage_start AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_start, time_coverage_end AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_end, geospatial_lon_max, geospatial_lat_max, geospatial_vertical_min, geospatial_vertical_max , geom FROM deployments d JOIN indexed_file f ON d.file_id = f.id WHERE f.url LIKE 'IMOS%'

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS aims_mmp_ctd_profiles_map; CREATE VIEW aims_mmp_ctd_profiles_map AS SELECT d.file_id, f.url, f.size, site_short_name, cruise_id, station, time_coverage_start AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_start, time_coverage_end AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_end, geospatial_lon_max, geospatial_lat_max, geospatial_vertical_min, geospatial_vertical_max , geom FROM deployments d JOIN indexed_file f ON d.file_id = f.id WHERE f.url LIKE 'AIMS%'

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS anmn_nrs_ctd_profiles_data; CREATE VIEW anmn_nrs_ctd_profiles_data AS SELECT measurements.file_id, a.site_code, a.cruise_id, a.time_coverage_start AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_start, a.time_coverage_end AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_end, "TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "TIME", "INSTANCE", "DIRECTION", "TIME_quality_control", "LATITUDE", "LATITUDE_quality_control", "LONGITUDE", "LONGITUDE_quality_control", "DEPTH", "DEPTH_quality_control", "BOT_DEPTH", "BOT_DEPTH_quality_control", "PRES_REL" , "PRES_REL_quality_control", "TEMP", "TEMP_quality_control", "PSAL", "PSAL_quality_control", "DOX2", "DOX2_quality_control", "TURB", "TURB_quality_control", "CHLF", "CHLF_quality_control", "CHLU", "CHLU_quality_control", "CPHL", "CPHL_quality_control", "CNDC" , "CNDC_quality_control", "DESC" , "DESC_quality_control", "DENS" , "DENS_quality_control", a.geom FROM measurements JOIN deployments a ON measurements.file_id = a.file_id JOIN indexed_file f ON a.file_id = f.id WHERE f.url LIKE 'IMOS%' ORDER BY measurements.file_id,measurements."TIME",measurements."DEPTH";

changeSet.author: talend
changeSet.sql: DROP VIEW IF EXISTS aims_mmp_ctd_profiles_data; CREATE VIEW aims_mmp_ctd_profiles_data AS SELECT measurements.file_id, a.site_short_name, a.cruise_id, a.time_coverage_start AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_start, a.time_coverage_end AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS time_coverage_end, "TIME" AT TIME ZONE 'UTC' AS "TIME", "DIRECTION", "LATITUDE", "LONGITUDE", "DEPTH", "BOT_DEPTH", "BOAT_SHADOW", "PRES_REL", "BAT_PERCENT", "TEMP", "PSAL", "TURB", "N_BIN", "CPHL", "PAR", "CNDC", "SBE_FLAG", a.geom FROM measurements JOIN deployments a ON measurements.file_id = a.file_id JOIN indexed_file f ON a.file_id = f.id WHERE f.url LIKE 'AIMS%' ORDER BY measurements.file_id,measurements."TIME",measurements."DEPTH";
